item.description:
Kadanse is a fun and casual dance studio located on the North Shore. Please join us for our Beginner Group classes on Monday nights! Single students and couples are welcome. In this class, we will alternate between popular Ballroom and Latin dances, from Swing and ChaCha to Foxtrot and Tango.

When: Mondays @ 6:45pm

Level: Newcomer (no prior experience required)

Cost: $10 per person/per class

Contact us for additional information:

www.kadanse.com 781-27-DANCE (273-2623) info@kadanse.com

group.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group

item.name: The North Shore Ballroom Dancing Meetup Group Weekly Meetup
